website_summaries.verdict: This great inexpensive vest is no-frills, but fits well and provides the extra pocket space you need.
pros: Adjustable straps help give you the right fit
Zip front pockets work well for fly boxes
Design allows for a good range of motion while you are casting
Quality is very good for the money
cons: Comes in only one size, which can make fit difficult for very large or very small people

customer_reviews.title: Need for Speed
customer_reviews.text: Wife said I look like a dork. I think I look like a fighter pilot ready to wipe the earth of rainbow trout.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy P.

customer_reviews.title: About 3 inches space between the 2 sides in front so the pockets kind of sit close to your side if you're skinny like me (6' 2'' 165)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to cut down on weight when backpacking in the mountains. Quality made, but not really ultra light. Weighs about 18 oz. My other vest is a full vest and only weighs 11 oz. Bigger than it looks. About 3 inches space between the 2 sides in front so the pockets kind of sit close to your side if you're skinny like me (6' 2'' 165). Designs allows for better range of movement when casting. If you're not too concerned with weight, it's a good product for the money. I'll keep it for bass fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No strain on the neck.
customer_reviews.text: I wish that I had found this product $250 ago. That is about what I have spent on hip packs, backpacks, and sling packs trying to find the right combination for my fly fishing. Since trying out this Gallatin Vest, I have put all of the other gear into a storage box. The vest meets all of my needs, has plenty of gear pockets in different sizes, and adjusts to where it is comfortable to wear all day long without any pulling on the neck.....which I just can't stand.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Strawther

customer_reviews.title: It helps to keep me safe and prepared for chores in a comfortable way.
customer_reviews.text: I don't fish in this vest. It's a cooler, light weight option for me to carry all my necessities around the farm during the day. The gloves and small tools, along with the iPhone and my .38 pistol. It helps to keep me safe and prepared for chores in a comfortable way.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G. Rewis

customer_reviews.title: Best hunting/fishing vest ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best damn small equipment carry vest I have ever owned...bar none!!!....I hog hunt at night and everything I need is in easy reach in the pitch dark....great in hot or cold weather. I truly love its minimalist attribute, adding very little carry weight. Comfortable and silent with excellent pocket placements and very good zippers. Dollar for dollar one of my very best pieces of gear.
customer_reviews.author: Saint Domino Swabisco

customer_reviews.title: Adjusts to fit just about anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Fits well on the shoulders and waist right under the ribs or adjust it down way lower. It adjusts pretty wide too. You can fit a lot of stuff in it which is cool but kind of defeats the purpose simply BECAUSE you can put a lot of stuff into it doesn't mean you should. Perfect for my needs great quality fully adjustable and I'm happy to spend my hard earned money on this as i can tell it will last 10+ years!
customer_reviews.author: รM๏кคŦг๏И

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: I am a professional photograpger, I use this vest at the car show's I work. It allows me to carry, pen's pad, cell phone, keys, wallet, chapstick, batteries, flash etc. Perfect for what I need. I love the fact that it just adjustable pockets and a strap, rather than a vest which will allow body heat to build up. I've used it for over a year at shows and still carry it with me, better than a sweaty backpack.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn harrington

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This is a well thought out vest that I bought to use for hiking when I dont want/need a backpack. Multiple pockets and compartments even large enough to carry an easy to access my water bottle up front instead of taking a pack off for a drink. Cant say enough good things about this vest!!
customer_reviews.author: SpringsDean

customer_reviews.title: Well made, lightweight vest
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice, minimalistic vest. I ended up returning it because the gap in the front is too wide for my narrow frame (doesn't work all that well with female anatomy, either. But it's a great little vest, wish it had worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Just a regular gal

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sits on neck and not comfortable at all. Won't be using this one at all. Product quality is decent though if you don't mind it on the back of your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Right Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Replacing an old vest
customer_reviews.text: ...with this new, abbreviated version. I am hoping it will help me take less stuff to the stream-- my old vest bulged with fly boxes etc. This one seems self-limiting. Well made, tough cordura material.
customer_reviews.author: Huntryx

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice vest with good quality its a bit longer than I thought it would be. This is uandy if your fishing and dont need alot of gear with you.
customer_reviews.author: Jorak

customer_reviews.title: Exceptionally nice vest. Am taking up tenkara and this will ...
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally nice vest. Am taking up tenkara and this will be perfect during hot weather. As one needs minimal gear, the vest is just what is needed. Can even park the rod in the inside pocket for hands free hiking.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Krensle

customer_reviews.title: Straps loosen too much on their own, zippers break quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The straps loosen too much on their own, and the zippers separated after like 5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Mindriot

customer_reviews.title: plenty of pockets and adjustments for use in hot weather
customer_reviews.text: plenty of spacious pockets, sturdy fabric, and construction, could use more d-rings
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: and this is just about perfect. Adjustable
customer_reviews.text: I don't fish, but I do hobble around on crutches. I need a lot of pockets of varying sizes at chest-level, and this is just about perfect. Adjustable, so I can wear it over a t-shirt or over a winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: John FowlerTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Vest
customer_reviews.text: An Excellent vest for the money. Outstanding actually. I bought it thinking it would be a basic fall-apart vest after a couple of years and it turns out to be very high quality. Heavy fabric, big nylon zippers, lots of storage. For something about a fourth of the price of comparable vests on the market I'd recommend it to anyone. And I've been fly fishing over 50 years and gone through several vests. This is one super deal.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B. Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: easy to access
customer_reviews.text: I use this vest to carry extra baits when I am wade fishing on the Gulf Coast.
customer_reviews.author: F M Patton

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Lots of pockets to hold everything you need on a river trip. And helps me look cool so I catch more fish
customer_reviews.author: Taryn

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! The hardest part about getting something new is to remember where you put everything. Try to stick with a system as you don't want to be fumbling around out on the rocks. Very comfortable and great for what I need it for.
customer_reviews.author: David Billings

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, cool, plenty of storage space.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight. Much cooler than my old vest on a summer day. Easy to adjust to fit. I am a fairly large man, and still have more adjustment room available. Plenty of space for storage. Wish it had a couple of small exterior pockets at the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good for fly fishing in MT
customer_reviews.text: I live in Montana and did a lot of fly fishing last season. Got this vest late in the summer. Wish I had it the whole time as it holds all my gear plus a couple beers. Also the price is right. 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: Cool and comfortable gear vest
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and cool. Plenty of room and easy access for all my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clayton

customer_reviews.title: The perfect "vest" for the minimalist fly fisher
customer_reviews.text: The perfect "vest" for the minimalist fly fisher. Well designed, comfortable, lightweight, and quite the bargain given the excellent quality. This UL vest is also slim enough to wear under your waders for those extra deep runs. My search for the perfect vest is finally over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolute must have for those who like to fish light, its my fishing binky
customer_reviews.author: bullybreed

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: Well made vest. Room for 20oz bottle in front pockets. Easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clouse

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice for the warm weather, plenty of room for most anything, great for fly fishing(wading) or kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: Paul H.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with 2 broken straps
customer_reviews.text: The item arrived with both retaining straps broken. Not usable and needs replacement!
customer_reviews.author: Russell Notides

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it! But the neck piece is a bit irritating when it gets hot out
customer_reviews.author: KaoCow

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like it very cool to wear in the summer.
customer_reviews.author: HRW

customer_reviews.title: Is adequate
customer_reviews.text: This vest pulls on your neck. Not all the zippers work.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V

customer_reviews.title: Great vest
customer_reviews.text: I took this vest to BWCA and it's the perfect vest. Pockets galore and light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Tom I

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for the price
customer_reviews.text: I own a few Allen Co. gun slings and thought I'd give it a try. It's perfect for the price. It is a solid working mans vest that should last a long time. Happy.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizing
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Perfectly size and located pockets, and it fits and looks great! Seems like it will hold up to many years of fly fishing adventures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Allen Gallatin Жилет Ultra Light
customer_reviews.text: Hello! Got a vest and very satisfied! The lines are smooth, everything is beautiful, made with love. Thank you seller for excellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Zakharov I.

customer_reviews.title: ... mostly fish in warmer climates so it was really comfortable except for the neck pad getting hot
customer_reviews.text: I mostly fish in warmer climates so it was really comfortable except for the neck pad getting hot. Plenty of pockets and storage space for everything I needed to carry with me. A rod holder would have been nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great, except for behind the neck
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I don't like about this vest is the part that goes behind your neck. It's a little uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: A. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: and just as good as much higher priced branded ones
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, rugged, functional (like me), and just as good as much higher priced branded ones.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Marucci

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: A little tight fit for bigger people but good product
customer_reviews.author: Wililam Pollock

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love the design After 30 fishing days some of the seems are failing
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cool and enough pockets to get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Wadding on shallow reefs in Oahu? You need this! Light, cool and enough pockets to get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy B

customer_reviews.title: Its fully adjustable which is great because my son is really tall but really skinny
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He's a fishing but and loves survivalist stuff, this fit everything he needs for both while keeping his hands free. Its fully adjustable which is great because my son is really tall but really skinny.
customer_reviews.author: Benje

customer_reviews.title: ... it for spring and fall trout fishing and works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for spring and fall trout fishing and works like a charm. Light weight, easy to wear a heavy jacket and this at the same time adjustable to give you a little more room. Lots of storage for everything you can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome! I love it
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! I love it. Just took it out for its first run on a river. Perfectly lightweight but plenty of pockets and stash-room.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, lots of storage pockets. Cute design and color.
customer_reviews.author: C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great vest, light weight with more than enough storage space. Highly recommended for any fly fisherman.
customer_reviews.author: Stan Dunham

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent as a gift to my father who loves spending time on his boat fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: My favorite vest!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this vest. It's spacious but lightweight and keeps you cool. Plenty of space and solid materials.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: He wanted something to carry his batteries in but wanted it to be light weight and comfortable. He tried this on and he loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for father that has a heart pump. He wanted something to carry his batteries in but wanted it to be light weight and comfortable. He tried this on and he loves it! Thank you for such great product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2 size 8x42 binoculars
customer_reviews.text: Yes, You can put 8x42 binoculars in one of the pockets?
customer_reviews.author: Faisal

customer_reviews.title: It works great! Very comfortable and plenty of pockets to store ...
customer_reviews.text: It works great! Very comfortable and plenty of pockets to store things plus open back strap keep you cool too.
customer_reviews.author: Soukhy Khongkhoune

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable when on, easy to get on and off, and has plenty of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: OK for the price you pay
customer_reviews.text: They vest is to be expected for the price. It feels like plastic and cheap. It does a good job holding your fishing equipment and keeping your back cool, but I'm going to spend the money and upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great For Aviation
customer_reviews.text: I am a pilot in Alaska and I use this as a flight vest to carry smaller essential survival items for backcountry flights and when I'm on CAP missions. Fuller-sized fishing vests bunch up at the bottom when you get into a cramped cockpit like a 172 or a 206. This is the perfect size so you're not rubbing against the yoke or getting it snagged on anything.
customer_reviews.author: R. Gardner

customer_reviews.title: Great price and the zippers are very durable and upgraded
customer_reviews.text: I am new to the sport and this is my first vest. I have used it 3 times so far and would purchase it again. Great price and the zippers are very durable and upgraded. The only reason I am not giving it 5 stars is because I want to use it for a year and see how it performs long term.
customer_reviews.author: Larry from Phoenix

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap buckles are placed where they ride on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder strap buckles are placed where they ride on my collar bones and it's very uncomfortable. I had to add fleece padding just to be able to wear it for any length of time. Would not buy it again !!
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: It is comfortable. Light and witk many pockets
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to take dog things when hiking or going to park. It is comfortable. Light and witk many pockets. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MG

product_meta.title: Allen Gallatin Ultra Light Fishing Vest & fly fishing vest
product_meta.description: The Gallatin Ultra Light Strap Pack has a lightweight design that maximizes storage capacity. With a padded neck strap and net D-ring, this one size fits most pack features zip close front pockets that hold large fly boxes, a large interior stretch mesh pocket for boxes or gear, high-viz lining, plus multiple exterior storage pockets. Comes with exterior D-rings for your accessories and heavy-duty molded zippers.
feature_bullets: Lightweight design with maximum storage capacity
Zip-closure front pockets hold large fly boxes
Large interior mesh pocket and multiple exterior pockets

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
